pages.excerpt: This page will help you get started with Github Upload. You'll be up and running in a jiffy!
pages.title: Getting Started with Github Upload

appearance.html_body:
Are you looking for Mobify.js or Mobify Client Documentation?

Read Mobify Client Documentation Instead

Overview

What is Adaptive?

Read an overview of the Adaptive.js framework, the way it fits into your technology stack, and its benefits.

Learn About Adaptive.js

How does Adaptive.js work?

See how Adaptive.js transforms your site to be mobile-friendly with the Mobify tag.

Learn How Adaptive.js Works

What is the Mobify Bundle?

Review a breakdown of the different components that comprise the Mobify bundle.

Learn about The Mobify Bundle

Working With Adaptive.js

As an experienced Adaptive.js user, browse these topics to enhance the features of your mobile site:

Adapting

Transform your desktop content into mobile content.

Scripting

Write User Interface JavaScript for your content and use your existing desktop JavaScript.

Styling Your Project

Implement your design with Sass and HTML.

Previewing

Preview your project on your computer or on a device.

Debugging

Fix and debug issues on your site.

Publishing

Deploy your site to production.

Automated Testing

Read an introductory overview of automated testing.

Integration Testing

Write automated tests to ensure that your mobile site has been transformed correctly.

System Testing

Automate user interaction in a browser to test your mobile site.

Manual Testing

Test the functionality and visual consistency of your mobile site across different devices.

Upgrading

Change your Adaptive.js version and its dependencies.

forwards,dash 1.3s 1s linear forwards,fadeOut 0.4s 2.2s 1 ease-in forwards;animation:fadeIn 0.8s 1s 1 ease-in forwards,dash 1.3s 1s linear forwards,fadeOut 0.4s 2.2s 1 ease-in forwards;opacity:0;stroke-dasharray:178;stroke-dashoffset:178}.c-lineLogo__fill{display:block;position:absolute;top:50%;left:0;padding-top:1rem;padding-left:2rem;-webkit-animation:fadeIn 0.4s 2.2s 1 ease-in forwards;animation:fadeIn 0.4s 2.2s 1 ease-in forwards;opacity:0;-webkit-transform:translateY(-53%);-ms-transform:translateY(-53%);transform:translateY(-53%)}@-webkit-keyframes fadeIn{from{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}@keyframes fadeIn{from{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}@-webkit-keyframes fadeOut{from{opacity:1}to{opacity:0}}@keyframes fadeOut{from{opacity:1}to{opacity:0}}@-webkit-keyframes dash{from{stroke-dashoffset:174}to{stroke-dashoffset:0}}@keyframes dash{from{stroke-dashoffset:174}to{stroke-dashoffset:0}}.c-linkList__listItem{margin:0;list-style:none}.c-linkList__link{text-decoration:none;color:#64B2AF}.c-panel{background:#F5F4F2;margin-bottom:2.14rem;padding:1.42rem;padding-bottom:0}.c-panel 1.43rem}.c-section{padding-top:2.14rem}.c-section+.c-section{border-top:1px solid #D9D7D4}.c-task{display:block;padding:1.43rem;text-decoration:none;will-change:background-color;-webkit-transition:background-color 0.15s ease;transition:background-color 0.15s ease}.c-task .c-header.c--level3{color:#64B2AF}.c-task:hover,.c-task:focus,.c-task:active{background-color:#F5F4F2}.c-task__description{color:#4C4945;margin:0}

pages.excerpt: This page will help you get started with Github Upload. You'll be up and running in a jiffy!
pages.title: Getting Started with Github Upload

appearance.html_body:
Are you looking for Mobify.js or Mobify Client Documentation?

Read Mobify Client Documentation Instead

Overview

What is Adaptive?

Read an overview of the Adaptive.js framework, the way it fits into your technology stack, and its benefits.

Learn About Adaptive.js

How does Adaptive.js work?

See how Adaptive.js transforms your site to be mobile-friendly with the Mobify tag.

Learn How Adaptive.js Works

What is the Mobify Bundle?

Review a breakdown of the different components that comprise the Mobify bundle.

Learn about The Mobify Bundle

Working With Adaptive.js

As an experienced Adaptive.js user, browse these topics to enhance the features of your mobile site:

Adapting

Transform your desktop content into mobile content.

Scripting

Write User Interface JavaScript for your content and use your existing desktop JavaScript.

Styling Your Project

Implement your design with Sass and HTML.

Previewing

Preview your project on your computer or on a device.

Debugging

Fix and debug issues on your site.

Publishing

Deploy your site to production.

Automated Testing

Read an introductory overview of automated testing.

Integration Testing

Write automated tests to ensure that your mobile site has been transformed correctly.

System Testing

Automate user interaction in a browser to test your mobile site.

Manual Testing

Test the functionality and visual consistency of your mobile site across different devices.

Upgrading

Change your Adaptive.js version and its dependencies.
